translations: 抢劫，掠夺；<非正式>敲诈；<非正式>盗窃；使……丧失，非法剥夺；（英足）夺（对手）的球（rob 的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.sentence: The driver was robbed at gunpoint.
A woman was attacked and robbed by a gang of youths.
sentences.translation: 一位妇女遭到一伙年轻人袭击和抢劫。

sentences.sentence: My boyfriend and I robbed a shop and were caught red-handed.
sentences.translation: 我和我男朋友抢劫一家商店，被当场抓到。
